# STAT-101: Introduction to Statistics

## LaTeX Macros

This course uses custom LaTeX macros for consistent mathematical notation:

- `\E{X}` — Expected value
- `\Var{X}` — Variance
- `\SD{X}` — Standard deviation
- `\Prob{A}` — Probability
- `\given` — Conditional bar
- `\Normal{mu}{sigma^2}` — Normal distribution
- `\Ho`, `\Ha` — Null/alternative hypothesis
- `\xbar`, `\ybar`, `\phat` — Sample statistics

## Course Structure

5-week introductory statistics course covering descriptive stats, probability,
inference, regression, and hypothesis testing.
